name: Findit (HD) - 200 Pictures
description:
*** Total 200pcs HD Pictures ****

Classical Find it game, one hundred to play without getting tired.

Each picture has 5 differences, find the correct different add 20 sec. But when touch wrong position, time will decrease 30 sec.
Every new Picture loaded will add 60sec. So total you will have 160sec to complete each picture.

-------------------------------------

Ludo 3D : A Unique Real Flying Chess / Aeroplane Chess
